about_the_game:
Hypcampex® is a 2D-platformer, action-adventure RPG set within Planet Photonus, where you embark on a journey as the legendary Electrex Bolt® to acquire the artifact of the Hypcampex® and stop the Avengers of Light, the Lavengers, from destroying the planet. With vibrant environments, pestering enemies, and innovative maps, you will be able to put your skills to the test and brave the war against the Lavengers. Will Electrex Bolt® succeed?


SAVE PLANET PHOTONUS FROM ANARCHY
Destroy the drone waves deployed by the Lavengers and best their tactics. The trials and puzzles that lie ahead will not be easy feats. It will take the most omnipotent of prowess.


FIGHT THROUGH SPACE
Battle through space on the BOLT Voyager V3 and show the Lavengers that Electrex Bolt® is the best pilot within the galaxy.


MASTER THE LIGHT
Does Electrex Bolt® have what it takes to master the light and revive those whom he has lost? Will he be able to conquer the Lavengers and acquire the Artifact of the Hypcampex®?

With vibrant environments, pestering enemies, and innovative maps, you will be able to put your skills to the test and brave the war against the Lavengers. Will Electrex Bolt® succeed?

Destroy the drone waves deployed by the Lavengers and best their tactics. The trials and puzzles that lie ahead will not be easy feats. It will take the most omnipotent of prowess.

Does Electrex Bolt® have what it takes to master the light and revive those whom he has lost? Will he be able to conquer the Lavengers and acquire the Artifact of the Hypcampex®?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 and Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Clear cache for best performance. Utilize SSD for faster performance. This game contains flashes and visual effects that could trigger seizures. Please consult with your doctor before playing if you are prone to seizures or epilepsy. STEAM DECK: To play on Steam Deck, select the game > settings > properties > compatibility > force use + Proton 9.0. Next, select the Deck right menu > Performance > Use per-game profile > Disable Frame Limit

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12 or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Clear cache for best performance. Utilize SSD for faster performance. This game contains flashes and visual effects that could trigger seizures. Please consult with your doctor before playing if you are prone to seizures or epilepsy. STEAM DECK: To play on Steam Deck, select the game > settings > properties > compatibility > force use + Proton 9.0. Next, select the Deck right menu > Performance > Use per-game profile > Disable Frame Limit

name: Hypcampex®

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7 6700 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 580 8GB or Arc A380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Clear cache for best performance. Utilize SSD for faster performance. This game contains flashes and visual effects that could trigger seizures. Please consult with your doctor before playing if you are prone to seizures or epilepsy. STEAM DECK: To play on Steam Deck, select the game > settings > properties > compatibility > force use + Proton 9.0. Next, select the Deck right menu > Performance > Use per-game profile > Disable Frame Limit

short_description: Hypcampex® is a 2D-Platformer that embarks you on a remarkable adventure across Planet Photonus as the legendary Electrex Bolt®, where he strives to acquire the Artifact of the Hypcampex® and battle through the war against the malevolent Avengers of Light, the Lavengers.
